Title: Luminous
Description: Luminous library consists of various .NET components, controls, classes, and extension methods which make programming easier.
HomeWiki:
Introduction to the Luminous library

Luminous library contains all my code released on my blog and the Code Project, and more:
  • WPF and Windows Forms TaskDialog (formerly VDialog),
  • Popup control,
  • GlassButton, (not yet)
  • notifying Windows Explorer about files in use,
  • ConsoleColor extension methods,
  • waiting until file is closed/unlocked,
  • Linq to CSS (simple),
  • various extension methods.
Only Managed Control Panel Items project will not be included here.
